definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Experiment result manifested that the anthraquinone content of Cassia tora L. is lower than Cassia obtusifolia L. in overall tendency.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示小決明的蒽醌含量總體趨勢上明顯低於決明。

sentences.chinese: 結果顯示小決明的蒽醌含量總體趨勢上明顯低於決明。

sentences.english: Objective To study antioxidant activity of extract of Cassia obtusifolia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究決明子提取物的抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: East Indian tree having long pods containing a black cathartic pulp used as a horse medicine.
sentences.chinese: 產於東印度的一種決明，具長莢果，含有黑色。

sentences.english: Specific application methods of cassia seed are summarized in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文對決明子的應用方法等進行了總結闡述。

sentences.english: SOD activity of Cassia corymbosa and Amorpha fruticosa increased significantly at first and then decreased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 傘房決明和紫穗槐的先升後降，各階段差異顯著。

sentences.english: Treatment of habitual constipation cassia seed 30 grams, boiling water, generation of tea drinking.
sentences.chinese: 治習慣性便祕決明子30克，開水沖泡，代茶飲用。

sentences.english: Cassia seed, the leguminous plant, is the food material which can be used as medicine and food.
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物決明子，是藥食兩用的食品原料。

sentences.english: Cassia often drink tea the effects the treatment of hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 經常飲用決明子茶有治療高血壓之特效。

sentences.english: Thermopsis having trifoliate leaves and yellow or purple racemose flowers.
sentences.chinese: 野決明屬的各種植物，三葉，開黃色或紫色總狀花。

sentences.english: Objective To establish HPLC fingerprint for the identification of Semen Cassiae.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立決明子飲片的HPLC指紋圖譜鑑定方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effective part of reducing blood lipid in Semen Cassiae.

sentences.english: Extraction and Determination of Emodin and Chrysophanol Contents in Semen Cassiae.
sentences.chinese: 決明子大黃素和大黃酚的提取與含量測定。

sentences.english: The scientific planting and development of cassia seed will bring all human beings huge benefits.
sentences.chinese: 決明子的科學蒔植和研發，將給全人類帶來偉大效益。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the determination method of Vanadium content in cassia seed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討富釩決明子芽中釩含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the species and quantities of serine protease inhibitors in Jue-ming-zi(Cassia obtusifolia L).
